name: Death Tracker
description: Tracks your normal mode deaths at every percentage

disable-tracking-completed-levels.name: Disable Tracking Completed Levels
disable-tracking-completed-levels.description: Disables death tracking on completed online levels.

disable-startpos-tracking.name: Disable StartPos Tracking
disable-startpos-tracking.description: Disables death tracking when playing from a StartPos. Deaths will still track from 0% in normal mode on a StartPos level.
